University of Sri Jayewardenepura

Managed official communication, documentation, and event organization for the society.

title: Volunteering
text:
Esala Foundation (Non-profit, 200+ members globally)

Treasurer: Managed financial records, budgeting, and donation oversight.
President: Led global volunteer teams, coordinated high-impact community events.
Organized rural school development, blood donation, and beach cleanup projects.
Strengthened international collaboration and donor engagement.

title: Research & Projects
text:
Python Bootcamp – PyData Sri Lanka & Illinois, USA

Analyzed a comprehensive dataset of registered public passenger vehicles in Illinois to uncover insights on transportation.
Applied Natural Language Processing (NLP) for sentiment analysis of user feedback and regional reports.
Built an interactive dashboard using Python (Plotly Dash) for visualizing key patterns and trends.
Conducted extensive data cleaning, preprocessing, and feature extraction to ensure accuracy.
Recognized as a top-performing team project for exceptional skill and impact.
View Certificate

title: About Me
text: I am a passionate data science enthusiast currently pursuing a BSc (Hons) in Statistics at the University of Sri Jayewardenepura, Sri Lanka (2022–2026 expected). Skilled in statistical modeling, programming, research, and scientific writing, I am dedicated to driving innovation and impactful outcomes.
